title: Enhancing Learning Design Practical Competencies: AI Literacy Improvement Process Utilizing Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and understanding of foundational social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Students can explain AI fundamental concepts (machine learning, data bias, etc.) with over 80% accuracy
Through gamification activities, learners can analyze AI ethics case studies and propose at least three solutions
During team-based projects, learners can develop educational content prototypes (e.g., quiz games) using AI tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
